Experts from CHEST visited and provided hands-on training to faculties at each participating hospital. Under the supervision of a joint steering committee consisting of leading experts from CHEST and China, 54 PCCM fellows from 12 leading hospitals have since graduated from the program.

8 In December 2016, the National Health Commission of China announced that formal subspecialty training (ie, National Fellowship) would become an integrated component of the postgraduate medical education system in China, and PCCM was selected as one of three pilot subspecialties. The China-Chest PCCM Fellowship naturally transitioned to the Chinese national program. Currently, more than 900 PCCM fellows are enrolled in 79 programs across China.
